definition: to follow suit/to imitate sb's example

sentences.english: If the parents watch too much TV, the kids will probably follow suit.
sentences.chinese: 如果父母電視看多了，孩子也會學樣的。

sentences.english: They are not afraid to mimic, even if they get it wrong.
sentences.chinese: 他們不怕有樣學樣，就算犯錯也無所謂。

sentences.english: Those who never studying in our campus has been kicked out.
sentences.chinese: 那些在我們學樣從來不學習的孩子被開除了。

sentences.english: I hate the man who has no personality.
sentences.chinese: 有樣學樣，我不喜歡，完全否定，不遺餘力。

sentences.english: They learn best by example, and should be provided with models of behavior.
sentences.chinese: 他們學樣學得最好，應該給他們提供行爲的榜樣。

sentences.english: To see a lamb at school.
